name: Aggroculture
description:
Aggroculture is a 2 player co-op rootin' N shootin' action game! Protect your farm from Old Mcdonald's army. If the flag on your farm goes down it'll be game over for you. Grab seeds with the pickup button and plant them with the use button. When a plant grows you can pick it up and use it as a deadly weapon!

In the year 40XX: Old Mcdonald has a globe-spanning farming monopoly. Only one piece of land has managed to elude his greedy clutches; the Franklin Family Farmstead. As his army of mechanical animal menaces approaches, the Franklin Family is determined to stand their ground to protect the home they've built over generations.



Made with love from Shanghai based indie team Peasant Friends for the 2023 Global Game Jam: Aggroculture | Global Game Jam

We had so much fun with this project that we decided to keep working on it! Please enjoy this prototype of Aggroculture and let us know what you think in the comments.

You can also follow us on twitter for more updates! @Peasant Friends (@PeasantFriends) / Twitter
